version_description:
Thank you everyone for playing!

We just squished a ton of bugs and are currently working on the next set of features.

Cheers.

-Team Hexar.io

#1. PERFORMANCE

version_description:
Thanks for playing everyone!

We have some fun things in this update!

1) New bases and skins! Hope you like them.

2) New control system! Touch mode and Left/Right joysticks.

3) Skip a mission!

4) Bug fixes and performan

We have a HUUUUGE update for you!

Introducing…

BLING!

You can customize your avatar with bling!

Earn bling from bling boxes. A regular bling box can be earned by achieving the # position 3 times. Big & Big Huge Bling Boxes

Thanks for playing!

You can now earn gems by completing missions!

... annnnnddd since we wanted to waste more of your time, we added 120 new mission sets.

You can also get free gems by watching a video in the shop. :)

Have fun!
